results.title: Antenna installation
results.creator_credit: Loucks and Norling Studios and McGraw-Hill Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Basic Television”.
Part of a series of films designed for screening to students studying television principles and servicing. This episode uses animation and live action to illustrate directivity and the characteristics of the basic dipole antenna, and to show a typical step-by-step installation of an antenna. It includes demonstrations to illustrate a chimney strap mounting, the use of stand-offs, the use of the Rawl drill, and the installation of the lightning arrester and ground rod. NB: This film may be considered out-of-date but useful for basic instructions (11/97).
results.creator_credit_for_label: Loucks and Norling Studios and McGraw-Hill Films
results.description:

results.title: Trombone and tuba
results.creator_credit: Milton Ingerson and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode number 9 of Series “Basic Music Techniques”.
One of a series of films designed to assist the musician and music lover. Professional musicians show how the trombone and the tuba are played, demonstrate their range and tone and how to care for them.

results.title: Trumpet and cornet
results.creator_credit: Milton Ingerson, Malcolm Smith and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode number 8 of Series “Basic Music Techniques”.
Part of a series of films designed to assist the musician and the music lover. Professional musicians, Glenn Madden and Gary Foot, demonstrate how the trumpet and the cornet are played, their range and tone, and show how to care for these instruments.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Milton Ingerson, Malcolm Smith and South Australian Film Corporation
results.description:
Episode number 8 of Series “Basic Music Techniques”.

description_for_label:

results.title: The French horn
results.creator_credit: Milton Ingerson, Malcolm Smith and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode number 7 of Series “Basic Music Techniques”.
One of a series of films designed to assist the musician and music lover. In the film professional musicians demonstrate total range, method of playing and care of the French Horn.

results.title: Oboe and coranglais
results.creator_credit: Milton Ingerson and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode number 4 of Series “Basic Music Techniques”.
One of a series of films designed to assist the musician and the music lover. In this film professional musicians show how the oboe and the coranglais are played, demonstrate their range and tone, and show how to care for them. Musicians: Rosemary Stimson, Jiri Tancibudek.

results.title: Flute and piccolo
results.creator_credit: Milton Ingerson, Malcolm Smith and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Basic Music Techniques”.
One of a series of films designed to assist the musician and the music lover. In this film professional musicians show how the flute and piccolo are played, their range tone, and how to care for them. Consultant: Verdon Williams (conductor).
